She is always flushing things down the toilet. You know how kids are.  Yeah, I have a little one myself. Anyway, these water pipes are really rusty, so they also should be changed. So tell me, what's the difference between the Board of Directors, the CEO, and the stockholders? They all seems ot be the same group of people to me...  No, there's a definite difference. You know, the stockholders are the people who own the company... they're the financial control system. Then there's the CEO — the chief executive officer. He's the hot shot, the main guy who is the boss. If there is only one person with absolute power in the organization, everyone knows that the power will go to their head. It's too dangerous.
